canonical_explanation.text: Food gives us energy to play, study, and grow. We eat different types of food like fruits, vegetables, grains, and milk. Some food comes from plants and some from animals. Fruits like mango and banana, vegetables like potato and spinach, and grains like rice and wheat come from plants. Milk comes from cows, eggs come from hens, and honey comes from bees. We should eat healthy food and avoid too much junk food.
rules: Food gives us energy to play, study, and grow strong.
Fruits (mango, banana, apple, guava), vegetables (potato, carrot, spinach, tomato), and grains (rice, wheat) come from plants.
Milk comes from cows and buffaloes, eggs come from hens, and honey comes from bees.
Healthy food includes fruits, vegetables, milk, roti, rice, and dal.
Junk food like chips, chocolates, and cold drinks should be eaten only sometimes.
We should eat meals at the right time and drink plenty of water.

questions.question_text: Which of these is a fruit?
questions.explanation_correct: Mango is a fruit. It is a sweet, juicy fruit loved by many people in India. Mango is also called the king of fruits.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Rice is a grain, roti is made from wheat, and dal is made from lentils. Mango is the fruit in this list.

questions.question_text: Which of these is a vegetable?
questions.explanation_correct: Potato is a vegetable. It grows under the ground and is used to make many Indian dishes like aloo sabzi and samosa.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Apple, banana, and orange are all fruits. Potato is the vegetable in this list.

questions.question_text: Where do we get milk from?
questions.explanation_correct: We get milk from cows. Buffaloes and goats also give us milk. Milk is used to make curd, butter, ghee, and paneer.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Plants give us fruits and vegetables, hens give us eggs, and fish live in water. We get milk from cows.

questions.question_text: Where do we get eggs from?
questions.explanation_correct: We get eggs from hens. Hens lay eggs which we cook and eat. Eggs are a healthy food for us.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Cows give milk, trees give fruits, and fish live in water. Hens are the animals that give us eggs.

questions.question_text: Which of these is healthy food?
questions.explanation_correct: Fruits and vegetables are healthy food. They give our body vitamins and energy to grow strong and stay fit.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Chips, chocolates, and cold drinks are junk food. They taste good but are not healthy for our body. Fruits and vegetables are the healthy choice.

questions.question_text: Roti (chapati) is made from:
questions.explanation_correct: Roti (chapati) is made from wheat. Wheat is a grain that comes from a plant. Wheat flour is mixed with water and rolled out to make roti.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Rice is a different grain used to cook rice dishes. Milk and eggs are animal products. Roti is made from wheat flour.

questions.question_text: Rice comes from:
questions.explanation_correct: Rice comes from plants. Rice is a grain that grows on paddy plants in wet fields. It is the main food in many parts of India.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Rice does not come from animals, water, or rocks. Rice is a grain that comes from the rice plant (paddy plant).

questions.question_text: How many meals should we eat in a day?
questions.explanation_correct: We should eat 3 main meals in a day: breakfast in the morning, lunch in the afternoon, and dinner at night. This keeps us healthy and full of energy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Eating only 1 meal or only snacks is not enough. We need 3 main meals a day: breakfast, lunch, and dinner to stay healthy and strong.

questions.question_text: Which drink is most healthy for us?
questions.explanation_correct: Milk is the most healthy drink for children. It makes our bones and teeth strong and helps us grow.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Cold drinks, coffee, and fizzy juice are not as healthy as milk. Milk is the best drink for children because it helps build strong bones and teeth.

questions.question_text: Honey comes from:
questions.explanation_correct: Honey comes from bees. Bees collect nectar from flowers and make honey in their beehives. Honey is sweet and good for health.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Cows give milk, plants give fruits and vegetables, and fish live in water. Bees are the ones that make honey.

questions.question_text: Which of these is a green vegetable?
questions.explanation_correct: Spinach (palak) is a green vegetable. Green vegetables like spinach, peas, and beans are very good for our health.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Banana is a fruit, milk comes from cows, and egg comes from hens. Spinach (palak) is the green vegetable in this list.

questions.question_text: Which of these is junk food?
questions.explanation_correct: Chips and cold drink are junk food. They taste nice but do not give us good energy. Eating too much junk food can make us unhealthy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Roti and dal, rice and vegetables, and fruits and milk are all healthy foods. Chips and cold drinks are junk food that we should eat only sometimes.

questions.question_text: Which of these foods comes from an animal?
questions.explanation_correct: Egg comes from an animal (hen). Mangoes, rice, and spinach all come from plants.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Mango is a fruit from a tree, rice is a grain from a plant, and spinach is a leafy vegetable. Egg is the only food here that comes from an animal (hen).

questions.question_text: Which of these foods comes from a plant?
questions.explanation_correct: Apple comes from a plant (apple tree). Milk comes from cows, eggs from hens, and honey from bees. Apple is a fruit from a tree.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Milk comes from cows, eggs from hens, and honey from bees. These are all from animals. Apple is the food that comes from a plant.

questions.question_text: Why should we eat breakfast in the morning?

options.text: To get energy for the day

questions.explanation_correct: We should eat breakfast to get energy for the day. After sleeping all night, our body needs food in the morning to work, play, and study well.
questions.explanation_incorrect: While parents do remind us and food tastes good, the main reason for breakfast is to get energy. Our body needs food after a long night of sleep.

questions.question_text: Which of these is a fruit that is yellow in colour?
questions.explanation_correct: Banana is a fruit that is yellow in colour. Bananas are sweet, easy to peel, and very healthy for children.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Apples are usually red or green, grapes are green or purple, and guavas are green. The yellow fruit is a banana.

questions.question_text: What should we drink a lot of every day?
questions.explanation_correct: We should drink a lot of water every day. Water keeps our body cool, helps us stay healthy, and gives us energy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Cold drinks, tea, and coffee are not as good for children as water. We should drink plenty of water every day to keep our body healthy.

questions.question_text: Paneer (cottage cheese) is made from:
questions.explanation_correct: Paneer is made from milk. When milk is heated and lemon juice or vinegar is added, the milk turns into paneer. Paneer is a popular food in India.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Wheat is used for roti, rice is cooked as a dish, and eggs come from hens. Paneer is made by curdling milk.

questions.question_text: Which part of the carrot plant do we eat?
questions.explanation_correct: We eat the root of the carrot plant. Carrots are orange and grow under the ground. They are roots of the carrot plant.
questions.explanation_incorrect: We do not eat the leaf, flower, or stem of a carrot plant. The carrot we eat is the root that grows under the soil.

questions.question_text: Which meal do we eat in the morning?
questions.explanation_correct: We eat breakfast in the morning. Breakfast is the first meal of the day that gives us energy to start our activities.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Lunch is in the afternoon, dinner is at night, and snacks are eaten between meals. Breakfast is the morning meal.

questions.question_text: Dal is made from:
questions.explanation_correct: Dal is made from lentils (pulses). Lentils are seeds that come from plants. Dal is a very common and healthy food in Indian homes.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Dal is not made from milk, fruits, or eggs. It is made from lentils (pulses) which are seeds from plants like moong, masoor, and toor.

questions.question_text: Which of these foods comes from plants AND animals?
questions.explanation_correct: Roti with milk comes from both plants and animals. Roti is made from wheat (a plant), and milk comes from cows (an animal).
questions.explanation_incorrect: Only fruits and only vegetables come from plants alone. Only eggs come from animals alone. Roti with milk has food from both plants (wheat) and animals (milk).

questions.question_text: Arun eats only chips and chocolates every day. What will happen?

options.text: He may become unhealthy and sick

questions.explanation_correct: If Arun eats only chips and chocolates, he may become unhealthy and sick. Junk food does not give our body the good things it needs to grow strong.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Eating only junk food will not make Arun strong or help him grow. It can make him sick. He needs to eat healthy food like fruits, vegetables, and roti-dal.

questions.question_text: Which Indian food is made from rice?
questions.explanation_correct: Idli is made from rice. Rice batter is steamed to make soft white idlis. Idli is a popular breakfast food in South India.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Roti, paratha, and puri are all made from wheat flour. Idli is made from rice batter and is a South Indian dish.

questions.question_text: Sort these foods: Mango, Milk, Rice, Egg. Which two come from animals?
questions.explanation_correct: Milk and egg come from animals. Milk comes from cows and eggs come from hens. Mango comes from a tree and rice comes from a plant.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Mango is a fruit from a tree (plant) and rice is a grain from a plant. Milk (from cows) and egg (from hens) are the two foods that come from animals.

questions.question_text: Which of these is an orange-coloured vegetable?
questions.explanation_correct: Carrot is an orange-coloured vegetable. Carrots are crunchy and sweet and are very good for our eyes.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Spinach is green, peas are green, and onion is white or red. Carrot is the orange-coloured vegetable.

questions.question_text: Priya is thirsty after playing. What should she drink?
questions.explanation_correct: Priya should drink water. Water is the best drink when we are thirsty. It keeps our body cool and healthy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Cold drinks, tea, and coffee are not the best drinks for children. Water is the healthiest drink, especially after playing and feeling thirsty.

questions.question_text: Curd (dahi) is made from:
questions.explanation_correct: Curd (dahi) is made from milk. When milk is set with a little old curd, it turns into fresh curd. Indians eat curd with rice and roti.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Curd is not made from water, wheat, or rice. It is made from milk. Milk turns into curd when it is kept warm with a little old curd.

questions.question_text: Which of these is the healthiest lunchbox?
questions.explanation_correct: Roti, sabzi, and a fruit make the healthiest lunchbox. It has grains (roti), vegetables (sabzi), and vitamins (fruit). This gives our body everything it needs.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Chips, chocolate, biscuits, and sweets alone are junk food. A healthy lunchbox should have roti, sabzi (vegetables), and a fruit.

questions.question_text: Tomato is used in many Indian curries. Tomato is a:
questions.explanation_correct: Tomato is a vegetable. It is red in colour and is used in many Indian dishes to add taste and colour.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Tomato is not a grain (like rice or wheat), not a dairy product (like milk), and not meat. Tomato is a vegetable used in cooking.

questions.question_text: Mango is a fruit.
questions.explanation_correct: Yes, mango is a fruit. It grows on a mango tree and is loved all over India. It is sweet and juicy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: This is true. Mango is a fruit that grows on trees. It is one of the most popular fruits in India.

questions.question_text: We get milk from hens.
questions.explanation_correct: This is false. We do not get milk from hens. Hens give us eggs. We get milk from cows, buffaloes, and goats.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Hens do not give milk. Hens lay eggs. Milk comes from cows, buffaloes, and goats.

questions.question_text: Eating fruits and vegetables is good for health.
questions.explanation_correct: Yes, eating fruits and vegetables is very good for health. They give us energy, help us grow, and keep us from getting sick.
questions.explanation_incorrect: This is true. Fruits and vegetables are packed with good things that our body needs. They help us stay strong and healthy.

questions.question_text: We should eat junk food every day.
questions.explanation_correct: This is false. We should NOT eat junk food every day. Junk food like chips, chocolates, and cold drinks can make us unhealthy. We should eat them only sometimes.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Eating junk food every day is not healthy. We should eat healthy food like fruits, vegetables, roti, and dal every day, and have junk food only as a treat sometimes.

questions.question_text: Rice comes from a plant.
questions.explanation_correct: Yes, rice comes from a plant called the paddy plant. It grows in wet fields called paddy fields.
questions.explanation_incorrect: This is true. Rice is a grain that comes from the rice plant (paddy). It grows in paddy fields with lots of water.

questions.question_text: We do not need to drink water.
questions.explanation_correct: This is false. We must drink water every day. Water keeps our body cool, helps us digest food, and keeps us healthy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: We absolutely need to drink water. Our body needs water to work properly. Without enough water, we can feel tired and sick.

questions.question_text: Potato is a fruit.
questions.explanation_correct: This is false. Potato is a vegetable, not a fruit. It grows under the ground and is used in many Indian dishes.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Potato is not a fruit. It is a vegetable that grows under the soil. Fruits grow on trees and plants above the ground.

questions.question_text: Which group has only foods that come from plants?
questions.explanation_correct: Rice, mango, and spinach all come from plants. Rice is a grain from paddy, mango is a fruit from a tree, and spinach is a leafy vegetable.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Milk comes from cows, eggs from hens, and honey from bees. Only rice, mango, and spinach all come from plants.

questions.question_text: Neha's mother packed roti, dal, a banana, and water for Neha's lunchbox. Why is this a good lunchbox?

options.text: Because it has grains, lentils, fruit, and water for a balanced meal
Because it is easy to make

questions.explanation_correct: This is a good lunchbox because it has grains (roti), lentils (dal), fruit (banana), and water. Together they give Neha energy, make her strong, and keep her healthy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: While being cheap, liked, or easy to make are nice, the main reason is that this lunchbox has different types of healthy food: grains, lentils, fruit, and water for a balanced meal.

questions.question_text: Guava is a fruit commonly found in India. Guava is:
questions.explanation_correct: Guava is a fruit. It is a round, green fruit found in many Indian gardens. Guava is very healthy and has lots of vitamins.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Guava is not a vegetable, grain, or dairy product. It is a fruit that grows on a guava tree and is very popular in India.

questions.question_text: Ghee (clarified butter) is made from:
questions.explanation_correct: Ghee is made from butter, which comes from milk. Milk is churned to make butter, and butter is heated to make ghee. In Indian cooking, ghee is used in many dishes.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Ghee is not made from oil, water, or sugar. Ghee is made by heating butter. Butter comes from milk, so ghee is a product that comes from milk.

questions.question_text: Vikram skips breakfast every day. Why is this not good?

options.text: He will not have energy to study and play
He can eat more at lunch

questions.explanation_correct: Skipping breakfast is not good because Vikram will not have energy to study and play. Breakfast is the first and most important meal of the day.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Skipping breakfast does not save time in a good way. Without breakfast, the body has no energy. Vikram will feel tired and hungry at school.

questions.question_text: Which of these is a citrus fruit (sour/tangy)?
questions.explanation_correct: Orange is a citrus fruit. It has a sour and tangy taste. Other citrus fruits are lemon, lime, and sweet lime (mosambi).
questions.explanation_incorrect: Banana is sweet, mango is sweet, and guava is slightly sweet. Orange is the citrus fruit that has a sour and tangy taste.

questions.question_text: Honey comes from flowers.
questions.explanation_correct: This is tricky but false. Honey is made by bees, not flowers. Bees collect nectar from flowers and turn it into honey. So honey comes from bees.
questions.explanation_incorrect: While bees do visit flowers to collect nectar, honey is made by bees. Honey comes from bees, not directly from flowers.

questions.question_text: Which of these is NOT a healthy eating habit?

options.text: Eating chips instead of lunch every day

questions.explanation_correct: Eating chips instead of lunch every day is NOT a healthy eating habit. Chips are junk food and do not give our body the nutrients it needs for a full meal.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Eating fruits, drinking water, and eating vegetables with roti are all healthy habits. Eating chips instead of lunch is unhealthy because junk food cannot replace a proper meal.

questions.question_text: Onion grows under the ground. It is a:
questions.explanation_correct: Onion is a vegetable. It grows under the ground and is used in almost every Indian dish to add flavour.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Onion is not a fruit, grain, or dairy product. It is a vegetable that grows under the soil and is used in cooking.

questions.question_text: We eat bread, roti, and rice. All three of these come from:
questions.explanation_correct: Bread, roti, and rice all come from grains. Bread and roti are made from wheat, and rice comes from the paddy plant. Grains come from plants.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Bread, roti, and rice do not come from animals, water, or milk. They all come from grains: wheat (for bread and roti) and rice (from paddy plant). Grains are parts of plants.

questions.question_text: Milk makes our bones strong.
questions.explanation_correct: Yes, milk makes our bones strong. Milk has calcium which is very important for strong bones and healthy teeth.
questions.explanation_incorrect: This is true. Milk contains calcium which helps build strong bones and teeth. That is why children should drink milk every day.

questions.question_text: Isha ate a banana, drank milk, and had roti-sabzi for lunch. She also drank water. What did she NOT eat from this list?
questions.explanation_correct: Isha did NOT eat junk food. She ate a fruit (banana), dairy (milk), grain (roti), and vegetables (sabzi). Her meal was very healthy with no junk food.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Isha ate fruit (banana), dairy (milk), grain (roti), and vegetables (sabzi). The only thing she did NOT eat from this list is junk food. Her meal was healthy.

questions.question_text: Papaya grows on a tree. So papaya is food from:
questions.explanation_correct: Papaya grows on a tree, so it is food from a plant. All fruits that grow on trees come from plants.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Papaya does not come from an animal or water. Since papaya grows on a papaya tree, it is food from a plant.
